messages.title: Working hard for people in Portsmouth South
messages.content: Since being elected in 2015, I have been putting my "Plan for Portsmouth" into action.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I have recently been out with our ambulance teams to see for myself the challenges they face, and we as a government working in our NHS as a whole. This government has increased NHS spending to record levels, and I'm fighting for further investment in Portsmouth's hospitals.

issues.health: I have recently been out with our ambulance teams to see for myself the challenges they face, and we as a government working in our NHS as a whole. This government has increased NHS spending to record levels, and I'm fighting for further investment in Portsmouth's hospitals.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am hoping to be re-elected by you on June 8th so that I can carry on the work I am doing with some of the brilliant people who support the local community.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for Portsmouth South
politicalExperience.achievements: Putting my "Plan for Portsmouth" into action.

images.caption: Flick Drummond with constituents and ambulance teams
